content.description:
P1.

Starts up the lowest point of the buttress into an OW. After the OW follow easier terrain trending slightly right. 5.10a, ~50m, 2-bolt anchor.

P2.

Two options exist: The right hand crack system starts with 2 bolts, layback to physical hand traverse to gain neat parallel cracks. 5.11.

OR

the left-hand crack system: Starts with 3 bolts, layback and jam your way, then turn the arête to finish with an easy runout. 3 bolts. 5.11+, ~30m, 2-bolt anchor.

P3.

Climb above the belay and into the quality parallel thin cracks then up and right following a hand crack, leave the hand crack with a hand traverse right. Gain the comfy belay ledge with a 2-bolt anchor. 5.10-, ~20m

P4.

Mantle above the belay to access the awesome corner. Tricky moves interspersed with good rests. Bring a 00 or two. 2 protection bolts, 5.11+, ~22m, 2-bolt anchor.

Descent:

Rap route in 5 single rope rappels (one additional rap anchor exists directly below the first pitch anchor).
content.protection:
(2 each) 00 to #2, (1 each) #3, #4.

(1) 70m rope (a 60m rope would probably work but we didn’t test it).
content.location: Up Laundromat Canyon (Zebra Gully) beyond the Green Room, left side of gully, about 20 minutes beyond Kadawn. ~45min total approach time.
